metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23303 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: The implementations of SAE in hostapd before 2.10 and wpa_supplicant before 2.10 are vulnerable to side channel attacks as a result of cache access patterns. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2019-9494.

criterions.comment: wpa package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
